[G Guardian](Usable when both fighters' vanguards are grade 3 or greater, and the number of face up G guardians in your G zone is three or less)-Opponent Turn's Guard Step-[Choose a card with "[Heal] Heal" from your hand, and discard it] Call this card to your (GC) from face down.
[AUTO][Generation Break 1]:[Counter-Blast 1 & Choose a face down G guardian from your G zone, and turn it face up] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Shield] +5000, choose up to one card from your hand, call it to (RC), and if you have two or more units with the same card name as the called unit, this unit gets [Shield] +10000.

name: Snow Element, Valancher
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[Counter-Blast 1] If you have a heart card with [Power] 10000 or less, draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, if you have a heart card with [Power] 10000 or less, choose up to one [Heal] from your drop zone, and return it to your hand.
[CONT]:This card is from all clans and nations.

[CONT]:This card is from all clans and nations.
